name: Pixelstar Hero
description:
Grab your laser rifle and let’s go hunting! Pixelstar Hero is an action-packed, turn-based, sci-fi, rogue-like, base-building, too-many-hyphens adventure game!

Join Hank and his pals as you explore strange planets and fight off vicious creatures! Collect crystals to build out your home base and buy powerful gear! Acquire mysterious artifacts and study them in your science lab to improve your abilities! Exclamation points make things sound more exciting!

Your home base provides a temporary rest stop between your adventures. Choose carefully when placing your buildings, enemies can attack at any time! Secure your base, choose your companions, and fight your way to the enemy homeworld!
